attributes.title: Donâ€™t believe the fake reviews.
attributes.review:
I got the app and gladly gave name, ph, and email. Every campaign spends lots of $$ to get such info. One way to support our great President is to help the campaign save $ and the info they will get anyway. 

As for the bad reviews, more fake news. The naked boy comment is just made up garbage,  just like the Russian pee pee video was a total fabrication. The left will stop at nothing to take down this country. 
The app works fine. Like a private social media app.

attributes.title: The bourgeoisie
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to summon the devil himself but All I got was a Notification saying it was my location. I finally caved in and allowed it then a white van was following me around I maxed up and went up to it.it was a white man with a all black outfit I opened up the door and grabbed the guy by the neck he looked me in my guy and punched me I hit him in the stomach and then the balls.i grabbed his face and rammed it in my knee he started bleeding in the nose and pushed me back.i took my stance and stared him in the face â€œNaniâ€he said with a shocked face I ran and punched him and slapped me so hard it replayed twice I almost got the black slapped out of me.I stepped back he ran in the car and drove off I got in my car and deleted the app I never thought this would happen to me donâ€™t download this app again u will be followed.
